verses.verse: Moreover, David <WH1732> and the commanders <WH8269> of the army <WH6635> set <WH914> apart <WH914> for the service <WH5656> [some] of the sons <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623> and of Heman <WH1968> and of Jeduthun, <WH3038> who [were] to prophesy <WH5012> with lyres, <WH3658> harps, <WH5035> and cymbals; <WH4700> and the number <WH4557> of those <WH376> who performed <WH4399> their service <WH5656> was:

Of the sons <WH1121> of Asaph: <WH623> Zaccur, <WH2139> Joseph, <WH3130> Nethaniah, <WH5418> and Asharelah; <WH841> the sons <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623> [were] under <WH5921> the direction <WH3027> of Asaph, <WH623> who prophesied <WH5012> under <WH5921> the direction <WH3027> of the king. <WH4428>

Of Jeduthun, <WH3038> the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun: <WH3038> Gedaliah, <WH9072> Zeri, <WH6874> Jeshaiah, <WH9198> Shimei, Hashabiah, <WH2811> and Mattithiah, <WH4993> six, <WH8337> under <WH5921> the direction <WH3027> of their father Jeduthun <WH1> with the harp, <WH3038> who prophesied <WH3658> in giving <WH5012> thanks <WH3034> and praising <WH3034> the Lord. <WH1984>

Of Heman, <WH1968> the sons <WH1121> of Heman: <WH1968> Bukkiah, <WH1232> Mattaniah, <WH4983> Uzziel, <WH5816> Shebuel <WH7619> and Jerimoth, <WH3406> Hananiah, <WH2608> Hanani, <WH2607> Eliathah, <WH448> Giddalti <WH1437> and Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, <WH3436> Mallothi, <WH4413> Hothir, <WH1956> Mahazioth. <WH4238>

All <WH3605> these <WH428> [were] the sons <WH1121> of Heman <WH1968> the king's seer <WH2374> to exalt <WH7311> him according to the words <WH1697> of God, <WH430> for God <WH430> gave <WH5414> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> sons <WH1121> and three <WH7969> daughters <WH1323> to Heman. <WH1968>

All <WH3605> these <WH428> were under <WH5921> the direction <WH3027> of their father to sing <WH1> in the house <WH7892> of the Lord, <WH1004> with cymbals, <WH3068> harps <WH4700> and lyres, <WH5035> for the service <WH3658> of the house <WH5656> of God. <WH1004> Asaph, <WH430> Jeduthun <WH623> and Heman <WH3038> [were] under <WH1968> the direction <WH5921> of the king. <WH3027>
And their number <WH4557> who were trained <WH3925> in singing <WH7892> to the Lord, <WH3068> with their relatives, <WH251> all <WH3605> who were skillful, <WH995> [was] 288.
And they cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486> for their duties, <WH4931> all <WH5980> alike, <WH5980> the small <WH9512> as well as the great, <WH1419> the teacher <WH995> [as well] as the pupil. <WH8527>

Now the first <WH7223> lot <WH1486> came <WH3318> out for Asaph <WH623> to Joseph, <WH3130> the second <WH8145> for Gedaliah, <WH9072> he with his relatives <WH251> and sons <WH1121> [were] twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the third <WH7992> to Zaccur, <WH2139> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the fourth <WH7243> to Izri, <WH3339> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the fifth <WH2549> to Nethaniah, <WH5418> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the sixth <WH8345> to Bukkiah, <WH1232> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the seventh <WH7637> to Jesharelah, <WH3480> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the eighth <WH8066> to Jeshaiah, <WH9198> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the ninth <WH8671> to Mattaniah, <WH4983> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the tenth <WH6224> to Shimei, <WH8096> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> to Azarel, <WH5832> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> to Hashabiah, <WH2811> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the thirteenth, <WH7969> <WH6240> Shubael, <WH7619> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the fourteenth, <WH702> <WH6240> Mattithiah, <WH4993> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> to Jeremoth, <WH3406> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the sixteenth <WH8337> <WH6240> to Hananiah, <WH2608> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the seventeenth <WH7651> <WH6240> to Joshbekashah, <WH3436> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the eighteenth <WH8083> <WH6240> to Hanani, <WH2607> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the nineteenth <WH8672> <WH6240> to Mallothi, <WH4413> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the twentieth <WH6242> to Eliathah, <WH448> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the twenty-first to Hothir, <WH1956> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the twenty-second to Giddalti, <WH1437> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the twenty-third to Mahazioth, <WH4238> his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve <WH8147>; <WH6240>
for the twenty-fourth to Romamti-ezer, his sons <WH1121> and his relatives, <WH251> twelve. <WH8147> <WH6240>
